com.google.code.rees.scope.conversation
Class MonitoredConversationContextFactory

java.lang.Object
  com.google.code.rees.scope.conversation.MonitoredConversationContextFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConversationContextFactory, Serializable
public class MonitoredConversationContextFactory
extends Object
implements ConversationContextFactory

Implements the ConversationContextFactory using MonitoredContexts for the conversation contexts

Author:
rees.byars

createConversationContext in interface ConversationContextFactory

createConversationContext

public Map<String,Object> createConversationContext(String conversationId,
                                                    Map<String,Object> sessionContext,
                                                    long duration)
Similar to createConversationContext(String, Map), but allows for dynamically variable durations. Could be used by a ConversationAdapter that uses some mechanism for assigning different durations to various conversations

Parameters:
conversationId -
sessionContext -
duration -
Returns:
